wizard.noteChangeType: You can change the company type by going back to the selection page.

step2.proposedLegalNameHint: Include the legal form suffix (S.à r.l., S.A., etc.)
step2.alternateNameHint: In case your first choice is not available
step2.companyPurposePlaceholder: Describe the main business activities and purpose of the company...
step2.registeredOfficePlaceholder: Street address, postal code, city, Luxembourg
step2.registeredOfficeHint: Or select domiciliation service in Step 6

step3.title: People (Shareholders, Directors, Managers, UBOs)
step3.noShareholdersYet: No shareholders added yet. Click "Add Shareholder" to begin.
step3.noDirectorsYet: No directors added yet. {formType} requires at least {minDirectors} directors.
step3.noManagersYet: No managers added yet. {formType} requires at least {minManagers} manager.
step3.ubosDescription: Individuals who own or control more than 25% of the company
step3.isPEP: This person is a Politically Exposed Person (PEP)

step4.title: Capital & Contributions
step4.capitalAmountError: Capital amount must be between €{min} and €{max}
step4.paidUpPercentageHint: For SA, at least 25% must be paid up at incorporation
step4.noContributionsYet: No contributions added yet. Add cash or in-kind contributions.

step5.title: Activity & Scale
step5.naceCodeHint: Statistical classification of economic activities in the EU.
step5.expectedTurnoverHint: Estimated annual revenue for the first year
step5.numberOfEmployeesHint: Expected number of employees when starting operations
step5.whyWeAskDescription: This information helps us prepare accurate documentation and advise you on applicable regulations, tax obligations, and reporting requirements.

step6.title: Notary & Domiciliation
step6.preferredNotaryNamePlaceholder: Leave blank to let us choose
step6.needDomiciliation: I need a domiciliation / registered address service
step6.domiciliationDescription: We can provide you with a professional business address in Luxembourg for your registered office.
step6.noteDomiciliation: If you don't select domiciliation service, you must provide proof of a registered address (lease agreement or property title) in the next step.

step7.title: Documents
step7.idDocumentsDescription: Upload ID or passport copies for all directors, managers, and UBOs
step7.leaseAgreementDescription: Proof of registered office address in Luxembourg
step7.capitalCertificateDescription: Can be uploaded after payment. Bank certificate confirming capital deposit.
step7.simulationNote: This is a simulation. In production, files would be uploaded to secure cloud storage.

step8.title: Review & Submit
step8.setupFeeDescription: This covers our administrative and coordination services. Notary and registration fees are separate and will be communicated by the notary.
step8.accuracyConfirmation: I confirm that all information provided is accurate and complete to the best of my knowledge
step8.pleaseAcceptConsents: Please accept all consents to submit
step8.submissionSuccessMessage: Your company formation dossier has been created. Our team will review it and contact you within 24–72 hours to proceed with the notarization and registration process.
step8.emailConfirmation: You'll receive an email confirmation shortly.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Book a consultation with our advisory team

FR.banking: Opulanz is a digital banking platform. Banking services are provided by licensed partners regulated by ACPR (Autorité de Contrôle Prudentiel et de Résolution).
FR.investment: Investment services are subject to MiFID II regulations and provided by advisors authorized by AMF (Autorité des Marchés Financiers).
FR.insurance: Insurance distribution is subject to IDD (Insurance Distribution Directive) requirements. Opulanz acts as an insurance intermediary.
FR.mortgage: Mortgage services are provided by licensed credit intermediaries. Subject to responsible lending requirements.

LU.banking: Banking services are provided by licensed and regulated partners.
LU.investment: Investment advisory services comply with Luxembourg law and MiFID II regulations.
LU.insurance: Life insurance products distributed in compliance with Luxembourg insurance law and IDD requirements.
LU.mortgage: Mortgage services provided by regulated credit institutions in Luxembourg. Subject to consumer protection laws.

story.title: Transforming Business Banking
story.intro: Opulanz is part of Groupe Advensys Luxembourg S.A., a holding company with over 18+ years of experience in providing comprehensive business solutions across Europe. We built Opulanz with a clear vision: to become the leader in European online banking for businesses.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To improve the ecosystem of business banking, payments, and operational processes using modern technology including AI and Blockchain.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the leaders of the European online banking market with full banking license and integrated blockchain technologies.

story.summary: Today, we serve commercial companies, financial institutions, investment funds, and freelancers across Europe. Our experienced team continues to innovate with cutting-edge technology while maintaining the highest standards of security, compliance, and customer service. We represent quality, trust, and innovation in business banking.

stats.title: Trusted by Businesses Across Europe
stats.subtitle: Our growth reflects the trust our clients place in us

strengths.title: What Sets Us Apart
strengths.subtitle: Three key pillars of our success

banking.title: Business Banking Expertise
banking.description: Over 18+ years of experience serving commercial companies, financial institutions, and investment funds across Europe.

platform.title: All-in-One Platform
platform.description: Complete business solution from company formation to banking, accounting, tax advisory, investment, and insurance.

technology.title: Modern Technology
technology.description: Leveraging Artificial Intelligence and Blockchain to make business banking better, easier, and more efficient.

certifications.title: Fully Licensed & Certified
certifications.subtitle: We maintain all necessary licenses and certifications to provide business banking and financial services across Europe, ensuring compliance with industry regulations and standards.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Opulanz?
whyChoose.subtitle: What makes us your trusted business banking partner

platform.title: One-Stop-Shop Platform
platform.description: Complete business solution covering company formation, banking, accounting, tax advisory, investment, insurance, and more - all in one platform.

experience.title: 18+ Years of Experience
experience.description: Part of Groupe Advensys Luxembourg S.A., we bring nearly two decades of expertise in serving businesses across Europe.

technology.title: Modern Technology Stack
technology.description: Built with cutting-edge Artificial Intelligence and Blockchain technology to provide efficient, secure, and innovative banking solutions.

focus.title: Business-Focused Approach
focus.description: Specifically designed for commercial companies, financial institutions, investment funds, and freelancers - not retail banking.

quality.title: European Quality Standards
quality.description: Operating across Europe, we maintain the highest standards of quality, trust, and compliance with banking regulations.

vision.title: Future-Ready Vision
vision.description: Working towards full banking license with integrated blockchain and green technologies to lead the European online banking market.

cta.subtitle: Join thousands of businesses across Europe who trust Opulanz as their all-in-one banking and business solution platform.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find quick answers to common questions

openAccount.question: How long does it take to open an account?
openAccount.answer: Individual accounts can be opened within 24-48 hours after document verification. Business accounts typically take 3-5 business days.

documents.question: What documents do I need to open an account?
documents.answer: For individual accounts: valid passport or ID card, proof of address (utility bill or bank statement), and source of funds documentation. For business accounts: company registration documents, beneficial owner information, and business plan.

fees.question: Are there any monthly fees?
fees.answer: We offer transparent pricing with no hidden fees. Monthly fees vary by account type. Individual accounts start from €10/month, and business accounts from €25/month.

currencies.question: Which currencies do you support?
currencies.answer: We support EUR, USD, GBP, CHF, and other major currencies. Multi-currency IBANs are available for all account types.

contact.question: How can I contact support?
contact.answer: You can reach us via phone at +352 20 30 40 50, email at support@opulanz.com, or live chat during business hours (Mon-Fri, 9:00-18:00 CET).

whatYouNeed.item2: Information about directors and beneficial owners (UBOs)
whatYouNeed.item3: Identity documents for all directors and UBOs
whatYouNeed.item5: Company formation details (if starting a new company)

processingTime.title: Processing Time
processingTime.description: Business account applications typically take 5-10 business days to review. We may contact you for additional information during the review process.

companyStatusStep.title: Company Status
companyStatusStep.subtitle: Tell us about your company so we can provide the right banking solution.
companyStatusStep.question: Do you have an existing company or want to start a new one?

existing.title: Existing Company
existing.description: I already have a registered company and need a bank account for it.

new.title: New Company
new.description: I want to start a new company and need help with company formation and banking.

companyFormationService.title: Company Formation Service
companyFormationService.description: We'll help you form your company in your chosen jurisdiction and open a bank account simultaneously. This streamlined process saves time and ensures everything is set up correctly.

jurisdictionStep.subtitleNew: Where would you like to form your company?
jurisdictionStep.helperText: This determines which banking partner and regulatory framework will apply

jurisdictionInfo.title: Jurisdiction Information
jurisdictionInfo.luxembourg: Luxembourg: Premier financial center with favorable tax regime for holding companies. Corporate tax rate: ~24%. Minimum share capital: €12,000 for S.à r.l. (limited liability company)
jurisdictionInfo.france: France: Large economy with access to EU market. Corporate tax rate: ~25%. Minimum share capital: €1 for SAS/SARL (most common structures)
jurisdictionInfo.finland: Finland: Stable Nordic economy with strong digital infrastructure. Corporate tax rate: 20%. Minimum share capital: €2,500 for Oy (limited company)
jurisdictionInfo.general: We'll match you with Opulanz Partner Bank that serves companies in your selected jurisdiction. Specific requirements and timelines will be provided after application review.

formationTimeline.title: Company Formation Timeline
formationTimeline.description: Company formation in {jurisdiction} typically takes 2-4 weeks. We'll guide you through the entire process and help you open your bank account simultaneously.

directorsUbosStep.title: Directors & Beneficial Owners
directorsUbosStep.subtitle: Provide information about company directors and ultimate beneficial owners (UBOs).
directorsUbosStep.ubosDescription: Individuals who own 25% or more of the company

whyWeNeedThis.title: Why we need this information
whyWeNeedThis.description: Banks are required by law (KYC/AML regulations) to know who controls the company. This helps prevent financial crime and ensures transparency.

companyFormationStep.title: Company Formation Details
companyFormationStep.subtitle: Provide information for forming your new company in {jurisdiction}.

companyFormationService.title: Company Formation Service
companyFormationService.description: We'll handle the entire company formation process including registration, drafting articles of association, and setting up your corporate structure.

companyFormationStep.proposedCompanyNameHelper: We'll check availability and suggest alternatives if needed
companyFormationStep.businessActivityPlaceholder: Describe your business activities (e.g., software development, consulting, e-commerce)

formationTimeline.title: Formation Timeline
formationTimeline.description: The company formation process typically takes 2-4 weeks. We'll keep you updated at each stage and coordinate the bank account opening to minimize delays.

documentsStep.title: Business Documents
documentsStep.subtitle: Upload the required business and identity documents for verification and compliance.
documentsStep.uploadLater: I'll upload documents later via my dashboard
documentsStep.uploadLaterDescription: You can submit your application now and upload documents later. We'll send you a secure link to your dashboard where you can complete the document upload.

fileRequirements.title: File Requirements
fileRequirements.quality: Documents must be clear and legible
fileRequirements.validity: All documents must be valid (not expired)

documentsStep.validationError: Please upload all required documents or select 'I'll upload documents later' to continue.

errors.invalidFormat: Please upload a PDF, JPG, or PNG file
errors.fileTooLarge: File size must be less than 5MB

reviewConsentsStep.title: Review & Consents
reviewConsentsStep.subtitle: Please review your information and provide the necessary consents to proceed.

processingConsent.title: Processing for Bank Introduction
processingConsent.description: I consent to Opulanz processing my personal data for the purpose of introducing me to Opulanz Partner Bank for account opening. This is required to proceed.

dataSharingConsent.title: Data Sharing with Partner Banks
dataSharingConsent.description: I consent to Opulanz sharing my application data with partner banks and EMIs for the purpose of account opening and compliance checks. This is required to proceed.

marketingConsent.title: Marketing Communications (Optional)
marketingConsent.description: I would like to receive updates, offers, and news from Opulanz about banking products and services. You can unsubscribe at any time.

dataRights.title: Your Data Rights
dataRights.description: Under GDPR, you have the right to access, rectify, erase, or port your data. You can also object to processing and withdraw consent at any time. See our Privacy Policy for details.

reviewConsentsStep.validationError: Both required consents must be accepted to continue with your application.

submissionStep.title: Application Submitted!
submissionStep.subtitle: Your application has been successfully submitted to Opulanz Partner Bank.
submissionStep.saveReference: Save this reference number for tracking your application

emailConfirmation.title: Email Confirmation
emailConfirmation.description: We've sent a confirmation email to {email} with your application details and reference number.

bankReview.title: Bank Review
bankReview.description: Opulanz Partner Bank will review your application and verify your documents. This typically takes 2-5 business days.

accountActivation.title: Account Activation
accountActivation.description: Once approved, the bank will contact you directly to complete the account activation and provide your account details.

submissionStep.documentUploadPendingDescription: You still need to upload your documents. We'll send you a secure link to your dashboard within 24 hours.
submissionStep.supportInfo: Need help? Our support team is available Monday-Friday, 9:00-18:00 CET. Email us at support@opulanz.com
submissionStep.submittingDescription: Please wait while we process your application...

individual.title: Individual Account KYC
individual.description: Complete your identity verification to open your account

form.documentDescription: Please upload clear photos or scans of the following documents (max 15MB each)
form.isPEP: Are you a Politically Exposed Person (PEP)?
form.sourceOfFundsPlaceholder: Please describe the origin of your funds...
form.consentKYC: I consent to identity verification and compliance checks as required by law

approved.message: Your account has been successfully approved!

nextSteps.mobileApp: Download our mobile app or access web banking
nextSteps.security: Set up your account security (2FA, PIN)

submitted.message: Your account application is being reviewed. You will receive a decision within 24-48 hours.

company.title: Company Account KYB
company.description: Complete your business verification to open your company account

form.documentDescription: Please upload clear copies of the following documents (max 15MB each)
form.activityCountriesHelp: Hold Ctrl (Windows) or Cmd (Mac) to select multiple countries
form.consentKYB: I consent to business verification and compliance checks as required by law

approved.message: Your business account has been successfully approved!

nextSteps.multiUser: Set up multi-user access for your team

submitted.message: Your business account application is being reviewed. You will receive a decision within 2-3 business days.

handoff.title: Secure Handoff
handoff.description: Your information will be securely transferred to {partner}

step1.title: Secure Handoff
step1.description: Your information will be securely transferred to {partner}

step2.title: Complete Application
step2.description: Follow {partner}'s process to complete your application

step3.title: Opulanz Support
step3.description: We remain your point of contact for any questions

hero.title: Complete Financial Services for Your Success
hero.subtitle: From banking to investment advisory, discover our comprehensive range of financial services designed to help individuals and businesses thrive in Luxembourg and beyond.

servicesSection.title: Everything You Need Under One Roof
servicesSection.description: Explore our comprehensive range of financial services designed to support your personal and business goals.

featuresSection.title: Your Trusted Financial Partner
featuresSection.description: We provide comprehensive financial solutions with the expertise, security, and personalized service you deserve.

expertFinancial.title: Expert Financial Services
expertFinancial.description: Professional accounting, bookkeeping, and financial management services tailored to your business.

taxOptimization.title: Tax Optimization
taxOptimization.description: Strategic tax planning and advisory services to minimize your tax burden while ensuring compliance.

investmentManagement.title: Investment Management
investmentManagement.description: Personalized investment strategies and wealth management to help you achieve your financial goals.

insuranceSolutions.title: Insurance Solutions
insuranceSolutions.description: Comprehensive life insurance products to protect what matters most to you and your family.

companyFormation.title: Company Formation
companyFormation.description: Complete support for establishing your business in Luxembourg with legal and regulatory guidance.

bankingServices.title: Banking Services
bankingServices.description: Modern digital banking solutions with multi-currency accounts and international payment capabilities.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Opulanz?
whyChooseUs.paragraph1: Opulanz brings together the best of traditional banking expertise and modern fintech innovation. As a fully regulated financial institution with presence in Luxembourg and France, we offer the security and reliability you need, combined with the flexibility and innovation you want.
whyChooseUs.paragraph2: Whether you're an individual looking for banking and investment services, or a business seeking comprehensive financial solutions, we have the expertise and services to support your success.

reasons.regulated: Regulated by ACPR and AMF for your peace of mind
reasons.expertise: Over 25 years of combined expertise in financial services
reasons.personalized: Personalized service from dedicated account managers
reasons.competitive: Competitive rates and transparent fee structure
reasons.multilingual: Multi-lingual support in English and French
reasons.comprehensive: Comprehensive suite of services under one roof

regulatorySection.title: Your Security is Our Priority
regulatorySection.description: We are regulated by leading European financial authorities, ensuring the highest standards of security and compliance.

ctaSection.title: Ready to Experience Banking Excellence?
ctaSection.description: Join thousands of satisfied clients who trust Opulanz for their financial needs. Open your account today and discover the difference.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Welcome back! Here's your account overview.
dashboard.bookConsultationDescription: Book a consultation with our advisory team
